description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) because it uses user input to construct a file path without properly sanitizing it. This could allow an attacker to access arbitrary files on the server. The function is also vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) (CWE-79) because it inserts user input into HTML output without proper sanitization, which could allow an attacker to inject malicious scripts.
